Content.title: Noogs
Content.name: Noogs
Content.bodyText: You should try the Bun Bo Hue at Song Que.  Although Song Que is really known for its Pho, the Bun Bo Hue gets a strong mention too.  Traditionally, the Hue should have a little chili kick already and to spice it up, fresh chilis should be used and never chili sauce.  Try this next time for added kick and let me know what you think.
